SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to increase the maximum length of the leave related to COVID-19 under the Canada Labour Code to align with the proposed changes to the Canada Recovery Caregiving Benefit and the Canada Recovery Sickness Benefit in the Canada Recovery Benefits Regulations.
